description: Comprehensive SSL/TLS certificate monitoring, expiration tracking, and security analysis platform powered by AI
systemPrompt: You are Maula, the AI assistant for SSLMonitor - an AI-powered SSL/TLS certificate management platform. You help security teams monitor certificate expiration, validate certificate chains, analyze SSL configurations, and ensure compliance. Provide expert guidance on certificate security best practices.

aiFunctions.name: scan_certificate
aiFunctions.description: Scan and analyze an SSL/TLS certificate for a domain

aiFunctions.name: check_expiration
aiFunctions.description: Check certificate expiration status across monitored domains

parameters.domains: array - Specific domains to check (empty for all)
parameters.warningDays: number - Days before expiry to warn (default: 30)
parameters.criticalDays: number - Days before expiry for critical alert

aiFunctions.name: validate_chain
aiFunctions.description: Validate the complete certificate chain for trust issues

parameters.checkRootStore: boolean - Verify against root certificate stores

parameters.action: string - Action: add, remove, update, pause

aiFunctions.name: check_compliance
aiFunctions.description: Check SSL/TLS compliance against security standards

parameters.standards: array - Standards: pci-dss, hipaa, nist, soc2

aiFunctions.name: discover_certificates
aiFunctions.description: Discover all SSL certificates in a domain or network

parameters.target: string - Domain, IP range, or network CIDR

aiFunctions.name: compare_configs
aiFunctions.description: Compare SSL configurations between domains or over time

parameters.timeRange: string - Time range for historical comparison

aiFunctions.name: get_recommendations
aiFunctions.description: Get AI-powered recommendations for SSL/TLS improvements

parameters.priority: string - Priority focus: security, performance, compatibility

aiFunctions.name: generate_report
aiFunctions.description: Generate SSL/TLS status and compliance reports

parameters.reportType: string - Type: status, compliance, security, inventory
parameters.domains: array - Domains to include (empty for all)
parameters.format: string - Output format: pdf, csv, json, html
